titleStmt.title: A worthy mirrour, vvherein you may marke, an excellent discourse of a breeding larke To the tune of new Rogero. By reading whereof, perceiue well you may, what trust is in friends, or in kinsefolke to stay.
titleStmt.author: Bourcher, Arthur.

titleStmt.title: A worthy mirrour, vvherein you may marke, an excellent discourse of a breeding larke To the tune of new Rogero. By reading whereof, perceiue well you may, what trust is in friends, or in kinsefolke to stay.
titleStmt.author: Bourcher, Arthur.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Richard Ihones, dwelling neere vnto Holborne Bridge,

notesStmt.note: A song - "A larke sometimes did breed,".
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
